name.japanese: ブルーフィンドエレファントツナ

description: A rare and enormous fish native to the South Blue with elephant-like features and distinctive blue fins. Considered a dream ingredient for professional chefs.
significance: Prize for the Loguetown Cooking Championship; a fish that Sanji had always dreamed of cooking.

history.event: Caught by Sapi and used as prize for cooking championship
Won by Sanji in the Loguetown Cooking Championship

reveals.information: The blue-finned elephant tuna comes from the South Blue but occasionally reaches the East Blue via ocean currents
